title: Interpretation of dirt in a dream: Seeing red dirt in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of dirt, for single women, for pregnant women, for divorced women, whether they walk on dirt in the desert, at home, on the street, cleaning, touching, eating, eating, red, yellow, black, dirt with it. Ibn Sirin, and much more. Interpretation of dirt in a dream Dust in a dream appears to people because they were created from it. Perhaps dust in a dream indicates animals and beasts, or the world and its people, for dirt is from the earth, and it is the basis of the life of creation, and the Arabs say: I am the dust of a man if he is rich. Perhaps the dirt in a dream indicates poverty, the dead, or the grave. Whoever digs the ground and takes out its dirt, if he is sick or afflicted with a disease, then this is his grave, even if he is traveling. . Then his soil is his profit, his money, and his benefit, and if he strikes the earth his journey, and if he is seeking marriage, then he is the wife of the earth, and the peeling of the pits, and the choice of the male. The dirt is the woman’s wealth, and if he is a hunter, then he digs it for a piece of hunting, and its soil is his profit and what he benefits from. As for the one who shakes off the dirt or shakes it off The garment is made of dirt, so if he is rich, his money is gone, and humiliation and need are beyond him, and if he owes it or has a deposit, he returns it to his family and everything. This is taken from his hand, and he needs someone after him, and if he is sick, he shakes his hand from his earnings. Hitting the hand with the dirt is evidence of speculation and profit, and hitting it with a belt or stick is the best way to travel. Some of them said: Walking on the dirt is a search for money, so collecting it or eating it brings him back. Money, and money flows in his hands, and if the land is for someone else, then the money is for another person. If he carries some dirt, then he will benefit as long as he carries it, and if he sweeps his house and collects dirt from it, then he is cheating, to take money from his wife, and if he collects it from his wife. a store. He collects money for a living. And whoever dreams: If he scatters dirt, then it is money that he finds, and dirt is money and dirhams. If he dreams that he removes the dust in the house and takes it out, then this is the loss of his wife’s money. And whoever demolishes his house and takes some of its dirt and dust, the inheritance money will affect him. And whoever dreams: As if a man was spraying on his head and eyes, then whoever sweeps will spend on someone who will encourage him to wear the uniform, and he will have a goal. If he dreams that the sky has rained heavy dust, then it is torment, and whoever sweeps his place and removes the dirt with a piece of cloth, then he will move from one place to another. Another, a person walks in the dirt searching. Money, and whoever hits the dirt on his head is affected by it, and God Almighty does not revoke it. The dirt is a person’s life and life, and the dirt indicates sustenance, agriculture, satiety and hunger. And whoever sees that he sat on good, pure land declares happiness and victory, perhaps it indicates doubt in religion. Perhaps it indicates the man’s soil, which It was created from it or the earth to which it returned, and the dirt with the woman in a dream represents a doubtful pregnancy. Perhaps the dust indicates water, fire, or wind; Because it is one of the elements, and indicates a difficult journey in which he needs to perform dry ablution. Perhaps the dirt suggested the issue of death, and perhaps the dirt indicates the debt that shames the debtor, and the dirt indicates the speed of relieving the need, and the fulfillment of the promise because it is tainted by what is written, and whoever has good goods, especially if he sees with them. . Or dirt on it. Interpretation of a dream about dirt says

title: Interpretation of bees in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Our next encyclopedia article revolves around the interpretation of bees in a dream, which is one of the visions that may seem strange to some, but it is one of the common and recurring visions for others that they often have during their sleep and during their lives. The dream does not always come with the same events, but it can change and vary between what contains good for the pioneer or what represents a warning message for him indicating the need to be careful about something. It is known that the bee insect is one of the insects that brings many benefits to humans in exchange for the harm that it brings It can result from it, as it produces honey, which is one of the most important nutrients beneficial to humans. (A drink of different colors comes out of their stomachs as there is healing for people). Interpretation of bees in a dream The prominent researcher Ibn Sirin gives the following interpretations of this dream: Seeing bees in the house indicates the birth of males without females. Seeing a beehive means marriage and happiness in the home and among family members. Seeing it In a dream, it heralds goodness in general, in terms of nutrition, money, and good children. Seeing it in large numbers symbolizes the dreamer’s desire to do good and help those in need. A bee that attacks the fortuneteller without harm symbolizes achieving great success academically if he is a student or practicing for those who undertake a commercial project. And his exit From the dreamer’s mouth indicates his good morals, good behavior, and adherence to speaking the truth. Although he believes that a bee sting in a dream is bad, Ibn Sirin sees it as beneficial and useful to the dreamer. Bee attack in a dream With regard to the interpretation of bees in a dream, in general, it is good He is looking for the dreamer, but if the dreamer leaves him, this is a sign that he has lost some good opportunities that could change his life. Which may be related to marrying a good girl, traveling, or doing a good job. While killing a bee when attacking the dreamer is evidence of his committing sins and disobedience, and turning away from what is directed to him with advice to repent. Interpretation of bees in a dream for a single woman. In the following paragraph, we provide interpretations for a single woman who sees bees in a dream. A dream during sleep: To see a person who shows psychological stability and is on the path to success in life. Bees flying around an unmarried woman in a dream symbolize good companionship and loyal friends. A bee sting in a dream shows her that she will marry a good man with whom she will find happiness and give birth to good offspring. Drinking honey for an unmarried woman is happy news and good news about something she has always wanted or a response to an invitation she prayed often. Interpretation of a dream about honeycomb for a married woman. Here are the following points: Interpretation of bees in a dream for a married woman, a bee sting and other cases of seeing it in a dream: And this dream is good news. And happiness, as it shows how much her husband loves her and the strong relationship that unites them. The bees wrapping around the married woman inside the house is a sign of the birth of good males who will achieve great success and benefit people. A bee in the house is the end of worries and problems, and stress changes to comfort and a lot of nutrition. Seeing bees In a dream for a man, this symbolizes...

title: Interpretation of dreams about exams and lack of a solution

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the exam and not solving it in a single girl's dream When you see a girl failing the exam. This is the opposite of reality, because he will succeed and be able to achieve the things and things that he sees and desires because of God. In the event that the unmarried engaged woman is unable to take the exam in a dream. Perhaps it is a sign for her of the upcoming wedding date, God willing. As for the unclassified unmarried girl, she sees in a dream the failure to solve the exams. Good news about her upcoming engagement, and God knows best. If she sees herself solving the exams skillfully and sees her success. This is not auspicious for her to be upset in her marriage, and this results in problems that are presented to her, God willing, I know. Seeing cheating in exams is a sign of failure in life because he feels anxious and tense a lot. This previous dream urges her to abandon her fear and anxiety and fight throughout life, always for the survival of the fittest. See also: Interpretation of dreams about cheating in exams for single women Interpretation of seeing the exam and not solving it in a dream for a married woman If a married woman finds that she cannot answer the exam questions. This indicates that she and her family have difficult problems with them and that this woman will overcome all Difficult problems, God willing. If a married woman takes exams and cheats, this does not benefit her. It warns her against fraudulent or wrong ways to deal with her poor financial situation. She must take what is legitimate and righteous to save herself from God's punishment and wrath upon her, and God is the highest and most knowledgeable. And to see success in exams after the success of the answers, this indicates a good and happy coming for her to appear pregnancy, and God knows best. If she does not succeed in the exams and sees her failure, this is a sign that she will achieve stability in the coming period of her life, God willing. The presence of a married woman in the exam, and it may be difficult for her to solve some questions, warns her that she will face some problems. Perhaps the previous dream indicates that he is going through a health crisis due to the appearance of a disease that God knows. And if the married woman answers some questions and some do not find an answer to them. It is a sign for her that she and her family are not on good or good terms. She loves to try to improve things because she is related to the womb. Interpretation of seeing an exam and not solving it in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man sees a vision of an examination but cannot solve it. A sign that his life is full of many and many family problems that he faces and needs to seek God's help Come on. Passing exams because of positive questions is a sign of patience. And endurance in the face of the difficulties that he encounters in life and his problems as well, and he will try hard to calm life. And failing the exam because of solving the exam inside the committee. It may be a sign of self-struggle to get closer to God Almighty and let things go. And the things that do not bring him good and do not anger God, he must hasten to repent and do good deeds. Perhaps the exam is inside the committee and the person cannot pass it and fail it. It indicates that there are things that pressure him and affect his decision

title: Interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the different interpretations of seeing a prince in a dream from Imam Muhammad bin Sirin through the article “Interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream Ibn Sirin” God Almighty said: They said: Miserable dreams, and we do not interpret. Dreams in a world where you see (44 people) dreamed “. With them in your life and you may see other people you see every day and so on from different situations. The mind, and the representation of the devil, and it may be a true vision from God Almighty, and God Almighty alone knows the unseen. You should not pay much attention to the interpretation of dreams and in this article in the encyclopedia we present to you the interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream in detail, follow us. Interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered the most important interpreter of dreams in the world, and he sees in his interpretation the vision of sultans and kings in a dream as follows: Seeing a person in a dream that the prince came to him laughing and smiling. This vision expresses the good coming to the seer such as high positions and so on. It also expresses that person’s closeness to God Almighty and indicates the good morals of the visionary. If someone sees a prince in a dream. This vision symbolizes the high status that he will reach in his religion or in his knowledge. The poor man's vision of the prince in a dream indicates that the dreamer's condition will change for the better and that God Almighty will grant him money soon. If anyone sees the prince in a dream. This vision indicates that this person will get married soon. Seeing a person in a dream that he is a prince and has been dethroned. This vision symbolizes that this person will be fired from his job or that there is a big problem that he will face. If a person sees himself as a prince and dethrones his throne or cloak. This vision symbolizes the wrong way of this person in managing his life and that he is an unjust and ignorant person. Seeing the princess in a dream for a single woman Seeing a prince or princess in a dream expresses the same thing mentioned in the interpretations of all dream interpreters. It is interpreted as follows: Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream that she is a princess and that she is inside the royal palace. This vision expresses this girl's academic excellence, or in her work. If an unmarried girl sees a prince from a country other than the country in which she lives. This vision expresses that she will marry a man of a different nationality and travel with him. If a single girl dreams of a prince wearing an elegant white suit. This vision expresses that she will marry a prestigious man and an honorable position, and it also shows that she will be happy with this person. The vision of an unmarried girl, because there is a prince with beautiful features proposing to marry her. This vision is one of the auspicious visions that symbolizes the approach of good luck. The appearance of a prince offering a gold ring to a single girl in a dream symbolizes the approach of her engagement and marriage. The unmarried girl who sees the prince talking to her symbolizes a celebrity or a high-ranking businessman or her manager. This vision expresses the abundant good that will come to him in the shortest period of time. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the prince is feeding her or offering her food or helping her eat sweet-tasting foods, such as honey, fruits, and any kind of food, etc.

This vision expresses that she will marry a prestigious man and an honorable position, and it also shows that she will be happy with this person. The vision of an unmarried girl, because there is a prince with beautiful features proposing to marry her. This vision is one of the auspicious visions that symbolizes the approach of good luck. The appearance of a prince offering a gold ring to a single girl in a dream symbolizes the approach of her engagement and marriage. The unmarried girl who sees the prince talking to her symbolizes a celebrity or a high-ranking businessman or her manager. This vision expresses the abundant good that will come to him in the shortest period of time. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the prince is feeding her or offering her food or helping her eat sweet-tasting foods, such as honey, fruits, and any kind of food, etc.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an ear in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The ear in a dream is one of the strange visions that one did not expect in his dreams, as seeing an ear in a dream generally indicates good and good things for the dreamer and also varies according to the dreamer’s gender and social status in reality, so let us mention to you during the article the most important interpretations and explanations of dreaming about the ear in a dream. For adults and imams, especially the scholar Ibn Sirin. The ear in a dream. Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing an ear in a dream is evidence of a woman in the dreamer’s life, whether she is a mother, wife, or daughter. The ear in a dream is a friend and guide who supports the dreamer and always gives him advice and guidance. The ear in a dream means a lot. Of the money that comes your way and a lot of goodness. Seeing the ear also in a dream symbolizes good news and happy events that will come to the dreamer. The ear in a dream is the good deeds that a person performs and returns to God, and it was also said: from the taboos, problems and worries that he is exposed to The dreamer. A beautiful ear is happy news, and an ugly ear is a sign of many sorrows. As for seeing the ear in a dream and worms coming out, this indicates that the dreamer is far from hearing the truth and does not defend it, or that he is spreading rumors. It also indicates the song because it is the place in which it is commented. It contains beautiful jewelry such as gold and silver. The ear in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The interpretation of seeing the ear in a dream explains that the judge is the one who returns rights to their owners, resolves disputes between people and helps them obtain their rights. It is said that if the dreamer sees earwax and is in good health and there is no problem or illness This is evidence that he heard good news, but if the wax was spoiled or had an insect in it and the dreamer saw that he was eating it, this indicates that he has done many forbidden and false things. If a person sees the ear in a dream and its size is very small, this is evidence that he is far from God, and that he He does not keep his orders and obey him, and he is a person who does not follow the truth. He is on the path of desires and misguidance. If the dreamer dreams that he puts his finger in his ear, then this dream is undesirable, and indicates that he is a delusional person and follows sects, and God knows best. Seeing putting your hand on your ear in a dream is a sign of the muezzin in the mosque. It is said that seeing the ear In a dream, it is a sign of a corrupt person who spreads news and spies on others. And whoever sees a ring in his ear in a dream, this is evidence that he will be very happy with the marriage of one of his children and will see his grandchildren. If you see a woman with ears in a dream, this may indicate that

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing sesame in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Seeing sesame in a dream has many good interpretations and good news, and its interpretation varies depending on the state of the sesame and the state of the monarch. It can indicate the marriage of single people, an abundance of food for the married woman, and the alleviation of her worries. And many other interpretations that we will learn through the following lines. Interpretation of sesame in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of sesame in a dream. The interpretation of sesame in a dream carries many positive signs that bring comfort and peace to the soul, as it indicates the abundance of goodness and blessing in money and offspring. And whoever sees in his dream that He eats sesame, as this is evidence of good circumstances and a change in his life for the better. Most interpretive scholars believe that seeing sesame seeds in sesame seeds is a harbinger of goodness and abundant nutrition, while sesame oil is evidence of unhappiness and fruitless suffering. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of sesame in a dream. According to Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Shaheen believes that the vision of acquiring sesame from another person symbolizes a close life that has an impact on the dreamer. Among his interpretations is that sesame indicates the abundance of money, popular trade, the fame of the fortuneteller’s reputation and wealth, and his blessing on his wealth, which will increase day after day. Contrary to the one who saw that he was eating. Sesame and finds that it tastes bad, this is evidence that he is exposed to some crises and difficulties in life and may affect his obtaining forbidden money or consuming his money. others unjustly.Read more: Interpretation of seeing someone you love many times in a dreamSee also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream according to Al-NabulsiAl-Nabulsi’s interpretations will differ from the interpretation of sesame in a dream, but most of them are positive and good interpretations, as seeing sesame in a dream is a sign of many The money that the visionary earns through halal means. And whoever sees in his dream that he is planting sesame, this is good news that he will get his own job and it will provide him with a lot of money and livelihood. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is eating sesame seeds and he was a doctor, this is evidence of his mastery of his work and his success. In him and his great fame in the world and his good reputation. And whoever sees himself in a dream anointing his body with sesame oil and gets sick, this is good news that he will recover, God willing, and he will be restored to health and strength again after he was sick and weak. While whoever dreams that he is collecting sesame seeds in a dish, this is good news. About a lot of food and soon hearing the good news. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of sesame in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Next, we will present to you the interpretation of sesame in a dream according to the scholar Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing sesame seeds in a dream is one of the visions Al-Mahmoudah, which promises a good abundance, an abundance of livelihood and good news. And for a single person who sees sesame in a dream and that he gets it from a beautiful girl, this is good news about his imminent marriage to a pious, kind and reliable girl. Read more: Interpretation of seeing going out without a veil in a dream. See also: Carrying a hand A friend in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in one dream. Seeing sesame seeds in a dream for an unmarried woman is

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms for senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms: The vision has many meanings and interpretations, some of which are evidence of the goodness and livelihood that comes to the dreamer, and others may be an expression of the pressures and crises that the dreamer is suffering from in his life. The interpretation depends on many things fundamentally, including the details of the vision and the dreamer’s situation on the ground. Interpretation of a dream about a large house and many rooms. The spacious house and many rooms are evidence that the dreamer will achieve what he seeks and will reach a distinguished position in society. The spacious house and many rooms in The dream is a sign of changing attitudes, overcoming all crises in his life and getting rid of negativity. Seeing a spacious house and many rooms means that the dreamer will marry a beautiful and fair girl in the coming period if he is single. Seeing a spacious house and many rooms is evidence that the dreamer will reach a position Big and achieves unexpected success in his work. If the dreamer sees a spacious house that includes many rooms in his dream, this means that he will get rid of the disease that he suffers from or relieve anxiety if he feels distressed. Interpretation of dreams of a big house and many rooms by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a big house and many rooms In a dream, it means that the dreamer will receive great sustenance that he did not expect and that some good things will happen to him. Seeing a big house and many rooms indicates that a good future awaits the dreamer and that he will gain good status and position. Dreaming of a big house and many rooms is an indication of That the dreamer will pay off the debts owed to him and move from a state of distress and weakness to a stronger state. If the dreamer sees the big house and many rooms in his dream and finds that it is full of fish scales, this symbolizes that in reality he has some enemies conspiring against him and the dream of the big house and many rooms in The dream symbolizes that he has overcome all the difficult problems he faces in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms for single people: Seeing a girl in her dream who has a big house and many rooms means that she will soon communicate with a good man who loves her and will be supportive of her. If she sees in a dream a house A large house filled with many rooms, this indicates that she will enter into a romantic relationship with a young man who has great wealth. Seeing a large two-story house with many rooms in a girl’s dream indicates the occurrence of some positive events that will make her move to a situation much better than her current one. A girl seeing in a dream a large house and many rooms means that after a short time she will find a new job that will enable her to provide a decent life. Dreaming of a large house and many rooms in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that in the future she will enjoy a quiet and stable life that she will be happy with. Interpretation of dreams Entering a large house with many rooms for single people. Seeing a girl in her dream entering a large house with many rooms is evidence that she will excel in her studies, achieve great success, and will be in a high position. Entering a large house and many rooms in a dream means that she will get rid of her worries and sorrows in her life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a divorced woman according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a divorced woman. They are looking for divorced women. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a divorced woman. Because when a divorced woman sees this dream in her dream, she sometimes fears that bad will happen or because she considers it a warning to know that she is making a mistake. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse in a dream of a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream an unknown man accompanying her. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse For a divorced woman, it appears in this vision that she will be exposed to problems that will last for a long time, but God will save her from them forever. But if she is mixed up with someone she knows in the dream, then the interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a divorced woman. In this dream, it indicates the existence of a relationship followed by a lot of goodness. It could be a marriage or work relationship. And she gets a lot of money. If a divorced woman sees that her husband associates her with a feeling of love and comfort in a dream, then this vision tells her that her husband will give her peace soon, so she must open the door for him to enjoy a calm and stable life. If intercourse occurs between a divorced woman and a man, she sees her features in Her dream, the interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a divorced woman is that it is not good, so this dream warns her that she will be exposed to some danger. A health problem, so this must take care of her health. Read also: Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Contact with a pregnant woman by her husband and the feeling of happiness and ecstasy between them in The dream means that she went through an easy and smooth birth process that did not entail any difficulties and she will give birth to a healthy child. If a pregnant woman dreams that her husband has contacted her from the anus in a dream, this vision is not good because she is deprived of this contact. A dream about intercourse between a pregnant woman and a woman like her in a dream brings Good and evil at the same time, and good is the provision of the child, and evil is abandoning her upbringing and not taking care of her, and the reason may be in the gender of the child, which is female. This dream indicates that the divorced person is either He will return to the divorced woman again or he will get what he desires. But if a woman dreams of this because she thinks a lot about her instincts, then this dream has no interpretation, and it is the work of Satan to make her bad deeds attractive. A dream about a husband having intercourse with his wife in a dream indicates a friendly and loving relationship between them and the stability of the marriage.
